name: Glaive Rush
effect: Until the user's next turn, all moves used against it succeed even on a failed accuracy throw, and all attacks have their damage dice multiplied by 1.5x, rounded up. Inflicts Wounds.
description: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. This deals big damage to the target, leaving big gashes. This also leaves the user exposed, though, and a prime target for counterattack.
